Moperville Monthly Episode 14

Posted on 2020-11-21
Tags: with special guest Maplestrip

I was recently featured on the podcast Moperville Monthly, a podcast by Maplestrip about the webcomic El Goonish Shive.
In this episode we purport to talk about two arcs beginning on the date of my birth, but is that really what we talk about? Yes, but also other stuff.

You can listen to the episode here:
